abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column discusses St Louis Cardinals manager Tony La Russa, who is in his sixth World Series, third with the Cardinals; says La Russa, whose team beat Texas Rangers, 3-2, in Game 1, makes a deliberate effort to get every active player into at least one game.
snippet: Amid the shuffling of pitchers and lineups, there is another side of Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa that is often lost.
lead_paragraph: Amid the shuffling of pitchers and lineups, there is another side of Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa that is often lost.

headline.main: La Russa’s Caring Side Shows Up in the Box Scores
headline.print_headline: La Russa’s Caring Side Shows Up in the Box Scores
headline.seo: La Russa’s Caring Side Shows Up in the Box Scores
